torso.transformationDescription:
[npc.she] [npc.verb(notice)] [npc.her] skin has started to feel abnormally smooth and supple making [npc.her] look at your body in confusion. Suddenly [ncp.she] let out a moune of plesure as [npc.her] skin starts to become sensative [ncp.she] [npc.verb(notice)] [npc.her] skin is slowly turning vibrent yellow.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldYellow(nymph)], [npc.skinFullDescription].
